member.name: T:FMdotNet__DataAPI.RecordsGetResponse
member.summary: The response returned when finding a record or a set of records.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.RecordsGetResponse.ErrorCode
member.summary: Error number generated by the find request. 0 for no error

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.RecordsGetResponse.ErrorCodeScriptBefore
member.summary: Error code returned by the script called before the request.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.RecordsGetResponse.ErrorCodeScriptAfter
member.summary: Error code returned by the script called after the request.

member.summary: Error code returned by the script called before the sorting.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.RecordsGetResponse.result
member.summary: Result string generated by the find request (e.g. "OK" or "Bad Request").

member.summary: Total number of records in the table.

member.summary: The total record count in the found set.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.RecordsGetResponse.returnedRecordCount

member.name: T:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS
member.summary: All of fmDotNet. This version makes use of the official Data API released in FileMaker Server 17. As such it only supports HTTPS. Remember to force TLS 1.2 in your client if necessary. See the example console application for a way to do that.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.ServerAddress
member.summary: DNS name of the FileMaker Server. Remember that only HTTPS is supported so using the IP address will generate a security warning.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.Version
member.summary: The version of FMS - Data API is different in 17 than in 18 for instance.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.Port
member.summary: Use this if you are using a non-standard HTTPS port in your FMS config.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.ResponseTimeout
member.summary: Milliseconds used in HttpWebRequest to set the timeout

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.CurrentDatabase
member.summary: The name of the FileMaker file to target. Set by the SetFile method.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.CurrentLayout
member.summary: Represents the currently selected layout, set by SetLayout method.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.BaseUrl
member.summary: The shared URL for all the of the requests.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.FMAccount
member.summary: The FileMaker account name to use in the authentication request

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.FMPassword
member.summary: The FileMaker password to use in the authentication request

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.DownLoadFolder
member.summary: The folder where fmdotNet will save container data to.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.token
member.summary: The token that FileMaker Server generates after a successful authentication call. It is valid for 15 minutes after the last call to the API.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.createRequest
member.summary: Class for all requests that create new records

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.editRequest
member.summary: Class for all requests that modify existing records

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.findRequest
member.summary: Class for all requests that finds records

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.lastErrorCode
member.summary: The FileMaker error code from the last call made.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.lastErrorCodeScript
member.summary: The FileMaker error code from the last script executed after the Data API call.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.lastErrorCodeScriptPreSort
member.summary: The FileMaker error code from the last script executed after the Data API call but before the sort.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.lastErrorCodeScriptPreRequest
member.summary: The FileMaker error code from the last script executed before the Data API call.

member.name: P:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.lastErrorMessage
member.summary: The FileMaker error message associated with the last error.

member.name: M:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default constructor, requires all the info.
member.param: The DNS name of the web server.
Milliseconds to wait for FMSA's response. (Default is 100,000 or 100 seconds).
The version number of your FileMaker Server: 18 or 17
member.remarks: The FMS Data API only works over HTTPS. Make sure the client supports TLS 1.2. If it does not add something like this line to your code: System.Net.ServicePointManager.SecurityProtcol |= SecurityProtocolType.Tls11 | SecurityProtocolType.Tls12;

member.name: M:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Assumes the standard HTTPS port of 443

member.name: M:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.PatchAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpContent)
member.summary: patch as an asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.SetFile(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the target FileMaker file.
member.remarks: FMS Data API does not have a way to check if the file is available

member.name: M:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.SetLayout(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the target layout, the layout determines the database/table context
member.remarks: FMS Data API does not have a way to check if the layout is available

member.name: M:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.SetDownloadFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the folder where container data will be downloaded to.

member.name: M:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.Authenticate
member.summary: Gets a token based on the provided info. Make sure to set the target file first.

member.name: M:FMdotNet__DataAPI.FMS.Logout
member.summary: Logs out of the session and invalidates the token.
